description: A React component named NoteForm that provides a user interface for creating or editing notes. It manages form state for note title and content, handles form submission, and optionally allows canceling the operation.

methods.name: NoteForm
methods.description: React functional component rendering a note input form with title and content fields, submit handling, and optional cancel button.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Event handler for form submission; calls the provided onSubmit callback with note data.
